Disposition: unknown Seyrig, Tr√©sors du Levant (in press) The Parthian issues are presumably iden- tical with the Mardin II hd. described by A. Simonetta (see NC 1966, p. 29, no. 6). Simonetta's figures are: Mithra- dates II 32 dr.; Sinatruces 28 dr.; Phraates III 21 dr. If the coins of Mithradates II and III in the list above are combined the two lists are virtually identical.
